title: Does Anybody Want The Bilgewater Event Theme Song Back? (Summoner's Rift)
body:
I've been really sad after the Bilgewater event finished. When the even the was on, they changed the Summoner's Rift music, giving it a 'Piratey' swing. I feel in love with this track (Especially when G.P was the Announcer)! But when the even stopped, the Old (New or Old, depends what you pick) got replaced. And now, LOL didnt feel as epic as before. Meh, it was something i just needed to say

RITO PLSS!!!!!!! MAKE AN OPTION WHERE YOU CAN CHANGE IT TO THE BILGEWATER THEME!!!! {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
